name: aw
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to express disappointment or disapproval: He says "Aw, I thought you were somebody else." If you don't vote, you can't go around saying, "Aw man, everything's all wrong!" Aw gee, you said you weren't gonna cry! Aww, you ruined it!
used to express sympathy or love, especially when you find something or someone cute (= attractive and pleasant in the way that babies or baby animals are): Aw, that poor guy. All the aunties had that "Aw, isn't he cute?" look on their faces. Aww, bless their hearts, they did their best.
